message.content: cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.DL, cs.LG. The paper discusses a novel academic search task called "aspect-based retrieval" which involves estimating a language model for the aspect and query using a domain-specific knowledge base. This task is relevant to several sub-categories of computer science, including information retrieval (cs.IR), computational linguistics (cs.CL), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), deep learning (cs.DL), and machine learning (cs.LG).
